# layoutAttributesForItems(in:)

**Instance Method**

The set of layout attributes for all items within the provided rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func layoutAttributesForItems(in rect: NSRect) -> Set<NSScrubberLayoutAttributes>
```

## Discussion

The base implementation returns an empty [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSet].

## Subclassing a scrubber layout

- **prepare()**: Gives you an opportunity to perform layout calculations when the scrubber’s layout is invalidated.
- **scrubberContentSize**: The size required to contain all elements within the scrubber.
- **layoutAttributesForItem(at:)**: The layout attributes for the item with the specified index.
- **shouldInvalidateLayoutForSelectionChange**: Determines whether the scrubber should refresh its layout when the selection changes.
- **shouldInvalidateLayoutForHighlightChange**: Determines whether the scrubber should refresh its layout when an item is highlighted.
- **shouldInvalidateLayoutForChange(fromVisibleRect:toVisibleRect:)**: Determines whether the scrubber should refresh its layout in response to a change of its visible region.
- **automaticallyMirrorsInRightToLeftLayout**: Determines whether the scrubber mirrors its layout for right-to-left layouts.
